subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Bonnies are in their first N.C.A.A. tournament; Notre Dame, their opponent on Sunday, and the other remaining Raleigh Region teams have all won national titles.
snippet: The Bonnies are in their first N.C.A.A. tournament; Notre Dame, their opponent on Sunday, and the other remaining Raleigh Region teams have all won national titles.
